Isabella Rodriguez.description: working at the counter at Hobbs Cafe (conversing about Isabella Rodriguez and Maria Lopez are coordinating the final details for the evening event, including checking decorations and supplies, confirming seating arrangements and number of guests, testing the sound system, finalizing the menu and drinks, setting up the lighting, coordinating entertainment and activities with Klaus, and checking the availability of parking.) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating
